result.title: ERA Mobility and Career Day brochure
result.description: A printed publication, including practical information about the ERA Mobility and Career Day, is intended to be distributed to event participants and also made available later on for future reference. Estimated quantity: 300 copies (number to be adjusted based on the number of registered participants) in addition to the electronic version which will be available online. The brochure will contain the program and agenda, information about invited speakers and trainers, profile of the employer organizations (descriptions, area of research, contact information) and a selection of practical resources that are identified as relevant for the target group, such as the link to EURAXESS portal, web links to various networks for researchers, etc.

A total of 720 product selections of top energy-efficient products (16 countries * 15 categories * 3 sub- categories), updated at least every six months to reflect market development. Product selections will be uploaded to national websites on WP4.

result.title: State-of-the art of the regulations and requirements to access a doctoral programme in each participant country
result.description: State-of-the art of the regulations and requirements to access a doctoral programme in each participant country (M29). Report summarising all the information collected from academic partners regarding the requirements to access a doctoral programme in each institution and the regulation under which the doctoral programme of the respective country is governed. It will also explain the approach based on co-tutelles, giving the total number of planned agreements.

result.title: Periodic Websites Update (1 of 7)
result.description:
All 16 national websites up and running, displaying lists of top energy-efficient products in at least 15 categories. Categories may differ depending on country circumstances. Latest version of lists online, older versions are stored and will be provided upon request.
Due dates: Websites on month 1. Lists updated at least twice a year. Indicative dates: 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36.

result.title: Final Report WP6
result.description: The report will inform stakeholders of the benefits of enhanced training and how the training ensures consumers are receiving a high standard of quality information that will enable them to take action and use their smart meters and IHD (where installed) more effectively and, in countries where the roll-out has not been completed yet, on how to involve installers/frontline staff and improve the implementation of the smart meter roll-out.
